df-drng
blocks.content: Define class of all division rings. A division ring is a ring in which the set of units is exactly the nonzero elements of the ring. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)

blocks.name: df-field
blocks.content: A _field_ is a commutative division ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: isdrng
blocks.content: The predicate "is a division ring". (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)

thm isdrng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cdr, crg, wceq(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wceq(cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))), c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cui, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cui)
  difeq12d(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), c2, csn(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  sneqd(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0g)
  df-drng(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isdrng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ DivRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 =(c2 \ { c3 })))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(Unit ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cdr, crg, c1 =(c2 \ { c3 }), (Unit ` hs0)=((Base ` hs0)\ {(0 ` hs0)}))
  eqeq12d((Unit ` hs0), ((Base ` hs0)\ {(0 ` hs0)}), c1, (c2 \ { c3 }), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Unit ` hs0), c1, (Unit ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cui)
  difeq12d((Base ` hs0), {(0 ` hs0)}, c2, { c3 }, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  sneqd((0 ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c3, (0 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c0g)
  df-drng(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 =(c2 \ { c3 }))
}

blocks.name: isdrng2
blocks.content: A division ring can equivalently be defined as a ring such that the nonzero elements form a group under multiplication (from which it follows that this is the same group as the group of units). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: drngprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same ring components (properties), one is a division ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)

thm drngprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))))

  eqeq12d(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))), wcel(c0, crg))
  unitpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c1))

  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c1)))), wcel(c1, crg))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  isdrng(c1, cfv(cui, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c1))

  syl(c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 =(0 `((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0))), c0 ∈ Ring)

  unitgrpid(c0, c1, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0)), (Unit ` c0))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0)))
  fveq2d(c0g, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0)), c2, c0 ∈ DivRing)
  syl6eqr(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](Unit ` c0)), c2, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s](c3 \ { c4 })), c0 ∈ DivRing)

thm drngid2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

} = {

  df-3an(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, c1), c1))
  anbi1i(wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wceq(co(c1, c4, c1), c1), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)))
  eldifsn(c1, c2, c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, cdr), wb(wa(wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wceq(co(c1, c4, c1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), c1)), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), cgrp))

  mgpbas(c2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)

blocks.name: isdrngrd
blocks.content: Properties that characterize a division ring among rings: it should be nonzero, have no nonzero zero-divisors, and every nonzero element ` x ` should have a right-inverse ` I ( x ) ` . See ~ isdrngd for the characterization using left-inverses. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.)

blocks.name: drngpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a division ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm drngpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(c0, crg)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cui, c1)))
  unitpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  difeq12d(cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)), cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(c0, crg)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  sneqd(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, crg)))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, crg)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cui, c1), cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c1)))), wcel(c1, crg))
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  isdrng(c0, cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  isdrng(c1, cfv(cui, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, crg))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(c0, crg))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm drngpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ DivRing ↔ c1 ∈ DivRing))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(× ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(× ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ DivRing, c1 ∈ DivRing, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧(Unit ` c0)=((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)})), (c1 ∈ Ring ∧(Unit ` c1)=((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)})))
  bitrd(w0, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧(Unit ` c0)=((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)})), (c1 ∈ Ring ∧(Unit ` c1)=((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)})), (c0 ∈ Ring ∧(Unit ` c1)=((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)})))
  pm5.32da(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (Unit ` c0)=((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)}), (Unit ` c1)=((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)}))
  eqeq12d((Unit ` c0), ((Base ` c0)\ {(0 ` c0)}), (Unit ` c1), ((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)}), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ Ring))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (Unit ` c0)=(Unit ` c1))
  unitpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  difeq12d((Base ` c0), {(0 ` c0)}, (Base ` c1), {(0 ` c1)}, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ Ring))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  sneqd((0 ` c0), (0 ` c1), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ Ring))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ Ring))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, c2 =(Base ` c0))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, c2 =(Base ` c1))
  adantlr(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  anbi1d(w0, c0 ∈ Ring, (Unit ` c1)=((Base ` c1)\ {(0 ` c1)}), c1 ∈ Ring)
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  isdrng(c0, (Unit ` c0), (Base ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((Unit ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  isdrng(c1, (Unit ` c1), (Base ` c1), (0 ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((Unit ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ∈ Ring)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0 ∈ Ring)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: fldpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a field iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fldpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cfield), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c0, ccrg)), wa(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c1, ccrg)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c1, ccrg))
  drngpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  crngpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  isfld(c0)
  isfld(c1)
}
